text: @RahulGandhi Sir help us I m student of MBA in Bikaner Technical university.i m in final year sir I request to you please suggest your rajasthan govt . They don't conduct exams 6 of the july. Because covid-19 spread fastly. I live in delhi I haven't transportation.
